phrs.translation: 巨头鲸；抹香鲸（等于Physeter catodon）

sentences.sentence: It only takes one sperm to fertilize an egg.
sentences.translation: 只需一个精子就可以使卵受精。

sentences.sentence: Conception occurs when a single sperm fuses with an egg.
sentences.translation: 当一个精子和一个卵子结合时受孕就发生了。

sentences.sentence: Each male ejaculation will contain up to 300 million sperm.
sentences.translation: 男性每次射精的精液含多达三亿个精子。
